title: Is there a scientific method of entrepreneurship? - Quora

response.answer_text: Man, the core of entrepreneurship IS SCIENCE. Entrepreneurship itself is a hypothesis driven (called value proposition) science experiment. Trial, error, investigate, in market and society. Social science if you like, psychology if you like. Just very expensive to do each iterations of experiment. The tools are trial, error, hypothesis (value proposition). But we don’t have governing equations. The system is super complex, each customer is a universe.

The scientific method is unnecessary because the human mind is structured like the scientific method. At the lowest level, we make observations. Then we ask questions about what we observe and invent theories to answer the questions. At the third level, we marshall the evidence and decide whether a theory is true or just probable. At the fourth level, we decide what to do with our bodies.
